item.description:
"We lost contact with the colony eight days ago. Reports are scattered at this point, but seem to suggest an encounter with a hostile alien lifeform - Command is denying anything of the sort, of course. We've been sent in to check things out, but I've got a really bad feeling about this...there were almost a thousand people down there, and there's no way they would all go quiet that quickly unless there's something very wrong..."

Bring your NERF blaster and get ready to plunge into unknown space in this day-long adventure for ages 6+! Event runs from 9-3, with early drop off and late pickup available (additional fees apply). NERF blasters available for lease; we provide all darts. Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $60/member, $75/nonmember.
item.name: NERF All Day Adventure: The Third Kind
